scripts.dev: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Development NODE_ENV=development dotnet watch --verbose run
scripts.prod: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production NODE_ENV=production dotnet watch --verbose run
scripts.build-all: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.vendor.js --progress --hide-modules && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --hide-modules
scripts.build-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.vendor.js --env.prod --progress --hide-modules && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env.prod --progress --hide-modules
scripts.publish: cross-env ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production NODE_ENV=production dotnet publish -o dotnetpublish
